member.name: M:CMS.FormEngine.FormHelper.GetFormInfo(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns FormInfo object for specified class name or alternative name. Method loops through supplied class list and returns first object existing. If alternative name is specified then it is merged with default class and then returned If coupled class exists for given alternative form then it is merged as well. If alternative form info not found then its default class is returned.
member.param: Class names or alternative names separated by semicolon
When returned FormInfo is used only for reading then cloning can be set to FALSE
member.returns: Null if no FormInfo found for any of the specified classes. Otherwise returns first FormInfo which was found.

FormInfo for After definition of the web part
When returned FormInfo is used only for reading then cloning can be set to FALSE
member.returns: Returns FormInfo object
